alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 2:26PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Diego County through 315 PM PDT... At 225 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy S22 Between Borrego Springs And Imperial County Line, or near Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Borrego Springs, Ranchita, Borrego Palm Canyon, Los Coyotes Indian Reservation and Ocotillo Wells Vehicular Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
